headline: Sustainability Magazine January 2026 Features SAP, NBA, Prada, Ecolab and General Mills on Net Zero Action
summary: The January 2026 edition of BizClik’s Sustainability portfolio is now live, featuring fresh insights from Sustainability Magazine. This month’s issues spotlight global leaders, breakthrough technologies, and critical sustainability strategies.
